thread.title: Caitlyn Jenner Offered to Pen a Memoir
thread.title_full: Caitlyn Jenner Offered to Pen a Memoir

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Caitlyn Jenner Offered to Pen a Memoir
text:
Comments A source has claimed Caitlyn has been receiving offers from publishers to write a memoir. 
Caitlyn Jenner would be having busy days ahead as it has just been revealed that she's been offered to write a memoir. The news came in the wake of official confirmation released by E! that " I Am Cait " is renewed for season 2. A source revealed in the new issue of Us Weekly that publishers have been lining up to secure a book deal with the Olympian turned reality star. "They want her to do a memoir," said the source. However, there have yet any further details about the books offer. Writing a book, in fact, is not something new for 65-year-old Caitlyn. Prior to transitioning into a woman, she penned "Decathlon Challenge" back in 1977 and the 1996 self-help guide "Finding the Champion Within." In addition to "I Am Cait", a representative for Caitlyn has confirmed earlier this week that the reality personality would be doing motivational speeches again. The five-city speaking tour, titled "Up Close and Personal," is set to be kicked off in February.
